summary: Completed comprehensive testing of YouTube video preview feature in PROMETHEUS SaaS video editing platform. All core functionality working perfectly including modal interactions, video preview popup, embedded YouTube player with autoplay, and source chip management.
passed_tests: Link icon opens Add Source modal successfully
YouTube tab is selected by default with all provider buttons visible
Multiple YouTube URL formats (youtu.be, youtube.com/watch, www.youtube.com/watch) work correctly
Video preview popup opens with embedded YouTube player and autoplay enabled
Video preview popup shows all required action buttons (Cancel, Open in YouTube, Import Video)
Import Video button adds YouTube source chip with correct format 'YouTube: https://youtu.be/[videoId]'
Source chips can be removed with X button functionality
Cancel button correctly returns to Add Source modal
UI/UX is professional with proper styling and accessibility
Modal transitions and animations work smoothly
